Name: RussianPunk 2007
About the game: The worker from the factory thought like everyone else that 2007 will not be returned!Until he accidentally stumbled upon magic mushrooms on his way home. Waking up after a bad trip in a typical at first glance garage. You are met by an emo boy named 'Sidoryuga' who asks to help him collect the oldest artifacts scattered throughout Russia in 2007. With which he will be able to stop the END OF THE WORLD IN 2012 Features: Cherry 'Blazer' Dollar for 30 rubles Boss battles Dynamic gameplay
